# cbiopourer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cbiopourer is to facilitate the creation of meta-data for data injestion of studies in cBioportal. It helps pour data into cBioportal.

## Installation

You can install the development version of cbiopourer from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("c1au6i0/cbiopourer")
```
